column2: in a booth with torn upholstery and very worn out springs
column3: I ordered a burger with goat meat and cheddar instead of American cheese
column4: and the corn elotes as a $7 side. The bun was brioche and well on the way to being burnt. Burnt was the overwhelming flavor of this burger. The cheese was American
column5: not cheddar. Other than the meat
column6: it was a mushy mess. The goat meat itself was fine. Â The corn elotes were good but would have been happier with half the portion.
